description: Situated in the charming historic centre, this hotel and restaurant are now run by the third generation of the same family. Welcoming dining rooms with a fireplace provide the setting for cuisine which makes the most of local produce while also including dishes from elsewhere in Italy. Don’t miss the black truffle specialities!
